title: (x) Meshell Ndegeocello "The world has made me…" album cover - Big Caslon {Yves}
content:
Hi all,

I love the beauty and elegance of this one. Hopefully somebody knows what it is! Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109225704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/61wkXOodz3L_4639._SS500_.jpg)

 [‹ Keith Urban & KT Tunstall font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109225704/http:/typophile.com/node/38926 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for nice freeware rounded fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109225704/http:/typophile.com/node/38937 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Massive

comments.content: Could this be Big Caslon by [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109225704/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%252BCarter)? Lemmecheck.
